sect1.title: Cherry picking
sect1.para: Cherry-picking in TortoiseGit is invoked from the Revision Log Dialog. Within this dialog, select the commit(s) to cherry-pick, then right-click on one of the selected commits to pop up the context menu. Select Cherry Pick this commit... (or Cherry Pick select commits... if more than one commit is selected).
The Cherry Pick dialog will be shown.

The Cherry Pick dialog is similar to the Rebase dialog. The top table displays one line for each selected commit to cherry-pick. Buttons below it control the actions (Pick, Squash, Edit, Skip) and the order in which multiple commits are picked. Selecting a line shows the files affected by the commit.
